scripts.build:lib: uglifyjs src/countrymerge.js src/layout.js src/chord.js src/timeline.js src/chart.js src/playtime.js -o lib/circular-flows.min.js -c unused=false -m
scripts.compile:test: npm run -s compile_flows -- -f data/test_data.csv -o json/test_data.json -r data/test_regions.csv  -t data/test_years.csv
scripts.doit: npm run build:lib && npm run -s compile_flows -- -f data/extra-flows.csv -o json/extra-flows.json -r data/regions.csv  -t data/years.csv
